title: Generate Narration
description: Generate voice cloning narration (F5-TTS or Chatterbox, please use reference voice in the same language as output), or narration with Gemini (8 voices, 29 languages, clear audio quality), Edge TTS or Google TTS for subtitles.
audioControlsHelp: Use reference audio <12s and leave proper silence space (e.g. 1s) at the end. Otherwise there is a risk of truncating in the middle of word
referenceTextPlaceholder: Enter text that matches the reference audio...
audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
f5ttsCancelNotSupported: F5-TTS library doesn't support cancellation during audio generation
chatterboxCancelNotSupported: Chatterbox library doesn't support cancellation during audio generation
noReferenceError: Please set up reference audio using one of the options above
noTranslatedSubtitlesError: No translated subtitles available. Please translate the subtitles first or select original subtitles.
f5ttsAudioTooLongError: Reference audio for F5TTS cannot be longer than 12s
noVideoError: No video available for segment extraction
timeRangeError: Please specify both start and end times
serviceUnavailableMessage: Please run the application with npm run dev:cuda (OSG Full) to use the Voice Cloning feature. If already running with npm run dev:cuda (OSG Full), please wait about 1 minute for it to be ready.
allServicesUnavailableMessage: All narration services are unavailable. For F5-TTS and Chatterbox, please run with npm run dev:cuda. For Gemini, please check your API key in settings.
initializingService: Waking up the narration server for the first run...
downloadNotImplemented: Download all functionality not implemented yet
noSourceSelectedError: Please select a subtitle source (Original or Translated)
modelNotAvailableError: Please download at least one model that supports {{language}} from the Narration Model Management tab in Settings.
nfeStepDesc: Higher values improve quality but take longer
batchSizeDesc: Set this smaller if your GPU cannot handle
downloadError: Error creating WAV file for download
saveToServerTooltip: Save to server for use with video player
noNarrationsAvailable: No narrations available. Generate narration first.
geminiGenerationIncomplete: Gemini narration generation incomplete. Generated {{generated}} of {{total}} narrations.
geminiConnectionError: Connection to Gemini was interrupted. You can retry the failed narrations individually.
groupSubtitles: Smartly group subtitles into fuller sentences for narration
subtitlesGrouped: Grouped {{original}} subtitles into {{grouped}} fuller sentences for better narration.
subtitleGroupingExplanation: This table shows how the original subtitles have been grouped into fuller sentences for better narration. Each row represents an original subtitle, and the grouped column shows how they've been combined.
f5ttsUnavailable: (Unavailable - Please install and run OSG Full)
chatterboxUnavailable: (Unavailable - Please install and run OSG Full)
chatterboxUnavailableMessage: Chatterbox service not started (use npm run dev:cuda)
exaggerationTooltip: Controls emotional intensity of the voice (0.25-2.0, neutral=0.5)
cfgWeightDesc: Adjusts generation strength and speaking pace
chatterboxEnglishOnlyControls: Currently only English supports these controls
chatterboxWarmingUp: Warming up narration server for first-time use...
chatterboxGenerationPartial: Chatterbox generation completed with {{success}} successes and {{errors}} errors
chatterboxNoReferenceAudio: Reference audio is required for Chatterbox TTS generation. Please upload a reference audio file.
audioAlignmentWarning: Despite applying smart narration alignment, the resulting audio is {{duration}} seconds longer than expected. Please use the speed slider above the audio list (set it faster) and regenerate the total narration using the Refresh Narration button on the player or the Download Aligned button
audioAlignmentSegmentWarning: The segment pushed the farthest is segment {{maxSegment}} (shifted {{maxAdjustment}} seconds), if this seems too far then you should set it faster using the speed slider above the audio list and regenerate the total narration, or adjust the narration timings as long sentences may have been placed in short time intervals
audioAlignmentWarningMerged: Despite applying smart narration alignment, the resulting audio is {{duration}} seconds longer than expected. Please use the speed slider above the audio list (set it faster) and regenerate the total narration using the Refresh Narration button on the player or the Download Aligned button. The segment pushed the farthest is segment {{maxSegment}} (shifted {{maxAdjustment}} seconds), if this seems too far then you should also set it faster, or adjust the narration timings as long sentences may have been placed in short time intervals
gttsSlowDescription: Speak more slowly for better clarity
edgeTTSGeneratingProgress: Generating {{current}} of {{total}} narrations with Edge TTS...
concurrentClientsHelp: Open multiple parallel conversations with Gemini simultaneously, WARNING: may quickly exhaust quota
selectModelExplanation: Choose a narration model that supports your subtitle language for the best results.
selectLanguageExplanation: Choose the target language for Chatterbox Multilingual TTS.
